sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ScheduledImportSetRunTime</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ScheduledImportSetRunTime</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ScheduledImportSetRunTime = Class.create();
ScheduledImportSetRunTime.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	date:function() { 
		var gr = new GlideRecord('scheduled_import_set');
		gr.addQuery('sys_id', this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
		gr.query();
		var runtime = ''; 
		if (gr.next())
 			runtime = gr.getValue('run_time');

		var dt = new GlideDateTime();
		// Revert the daylight saving adjustment after DEF0431911 is fixed
		var timeOffset = (dt.getTZOffset() - dt.getDSTOffset()) / 60 / 60 / 1000;

		var result = this.newItem("result");
		result.setAttribute("run_time", runtime);
		result.setAttribute("timeOffset", timeOffset);
	},
    type: 'ScheduledImportSetRunTime'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-08-09 05:16:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>93247d2943ec31103605c52bbab8f2f8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ScheduledImportSetRunTime</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System Import Sets" source="com.glide.system_import_set">cc63fca03c31311068bcf327dfe37f48</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_93247d2943ec31103605c52bbab8f2f8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-15 17:52:00</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
